attributes.action: Parliament must debate on Revocation of Special Status of Kashmir by India.
attributes.additional_details:
References: 
https://www.independent.co.uk/voices/kashmir-jammu-india-bjp-modi-article-370-constitution-pakistan-a9040956.html
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-asia-india-49231619https://www.express.co.uk/news/world/1162046/kashmir-article-370-india-revoke-special-status-jammu-and-kashmir-what-article-370-means
Another provision later added under Article 370 - 35A - gives special privileges to permanent residents, including state government jobs and the exclusive right to own property in the state.
attributes.background: India's government has revoked part of the constitution that gives Indian-administered Kashmir special status, prompting fears of unrest. Article 370 allows the state to have its own constitution, a separate flag and independence over all matters except foreign affairs, defence and communications.
